entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
